p:
A solution of ethyl 2-hydroxy-4-oxo-2-(trifluoromethyl)pentanoate 2 (0.45 g, 2 mmol) and 99% hydrazine monohydrate (0.53 ml, 11 mmol) in acetic acid (7 ml), was refluxed with stirring for 6 h. The solution was then poured into H 2O and extracted with EtOAc, dried by NaSO 4 and purified by column flash chromatography (petroleum ether/EtOAc 70:30) to produce pyridazinone 3 as white crystals (0.27 g, 69%); m.p. 184–185 °C (reported m.p. 187–189 °C
32 ).
